translations: 无储水罐的：指没有储水罐的设备，如无储水罐热水器，它可以在需要时即时加热水，而无需储存热水。
· We installed a tankless water heater in our home.
我们在家里安装了一个无储水罐的热水器。

sentences.sentence: We install tankless water heaters – then take longer showers.
sentences.translation: 我们安装即热式热水器，然后洗澡花的时间更长了。

sentences.sentence: Hole home on grid solar power systems on tankless water heaters and on chili pepper water pumps. And they must be UL Approved.
sentences.translation: 我美国客户（房地产开发商）寻求国内家用太阳能热水系统厂家，请有实力的厂家速与我联系，谢谢！

sentences.sentence: For even greater efficiency consider buying a tankless water heater. Tankless water heaters only heat water when it is needed, instead of keeping a reserve of water at a constant temperature.
sentences.translation: 购买无水箱热水器（电热水器）是更加节能的做法，电热水器只在需要的时候对水进行加热，而不会对保存在水箱内的水加热保温。
